titleStmt.title: A stay against straying. Or An answer to a treatise intituled: The lavvfulnes of hearing the ministers of the Church of England. By John Robinson. Wherein is proved the contrarie, viz: The unlawfulnes of hearing the ministers of all false Churches. By John Canne.
titleStmt.author: Canne, John, d. 1667?

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer from STC.
Pages 137, 138 missing in number only; text unaffected.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
